title: Everyone is a journal-ish
description: With the social media era behind us, tech-oligarchs want us to believe the future of everything is AI. For journalism, it means that avatars will report the news, generated by AI models, trained on the combined labor of every journalist, editor, and newsroom that’s ever posted online. Accuracy is traded for speed, where fast news...
